glsa.title: GNU Wget: Cookie injection
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerablity in GNU Wget could allow arbitrary cookies to be injected.

background.p: GNU Wget is a free software package for retrieving files using HTTP, HTTPS and FTP, the most widely-used Internet protocols.

description.p: A vulnerability was discovered in GNU Wgetâ€™s resp_new function which does not validate \r\n sequences in continuation lines.

impact.p: A remote attacker could inject arbitrary cookie entry requests.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All GNU Wget users should upgrade to the latest version:
